text:
Surrogacy Regulations 2023

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Surrogacy Act 2012 .

24 April 2023

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Surrogacy Regulations 2023 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on 1 May 2023.

3. Interpretation
    In these regulations â€“
        Act means the Surrogacy Act 2012 .

4. Fees
    The fees set out in Schedule 1 are prescribed as the fees payable to the court in respect of the matters to which they relate.

SCHEDULE 1 - Prescribed Fees

Regulation 4

Item  Matter  Section of Act  Fee (fee units)  1.  Application for parentage order under Division 1 of Part 4 of the Act  Section 13(3)(b)  65  2.  Application for parentage order under Division 2 of Part 4 of the Act  Section 20(3)(b)  65  3.  Application for discharge of parentage order  Section 27(3)(b)  65
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       


Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 April 2023

These regulations are administered in the Department of Justice.
